result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:37 am 
INCLUDES 15CM510, 15CM539, AND 15CM1002. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person, pro se. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed previously. VRCW. 

State moves to: 
In 15CM510: Ct. 1 (Retail Theft/PTAC)>>D&RI. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1002: Ct. 1 (Retail Theft)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CM539: Ct. 1 (Retail Theft)>>GUILTY. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, def is competent to represent self, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 1 year probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; fulltime employment/schooling of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours CS per week; no contact with Walmart in Rib Mtn, Kohls in Rib Mtn, and Shopko on 18th Ave; pay restitution of $138.69 to Walmart to be paid at a rate of $15 per month; court costs. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to NO days jail credit. 
COURT authorizes transfer of probation to Lincoln County. 

Adj: 9:50 am
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 20, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on June 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:38 pm 
INCLUDES 15CM510 AND 15CM539. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
State notes parties anticpate proceeding with plea at a future date and notes deft just needs to complete assessments before going forward. 
COURT removes jury trial. 
COURT sets calendar call on 5/20/2015 at 1pm with Br. 3 JA. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 2:39 pm

Pre-trial conference on April 13, 2015 at 03:10 pm.
Final pre-trial on May 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Jury Trial on May 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Includes 15CM510 and 15CM539.  No contact with victim(s):  Walmart (Rib Mt) and Shopko (17th Avenue, Wausau).  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.    Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.
